animations.title: Ripple Button
animations.description: Themed button with Material-style click ripple expansion.

animations.title: Button Jitter
animations.description: Playful button with continuous jittery animation and heartbeat on hover.

animations.title: Liquid Morph
animations.description: Button liquifies and reshapes on click with elastic blob-like deformation.

animations.title: Shockwave
animations.description: Concentric rings expand outward with distortion effects.

animations.title: Split Reveal
animations.description: Button splits open to reveal content/color underneath.

animations.title: Character Reveal
animations.description: Premium text reveal with layered shadows and character scale animations for achievement moments.

animations.title: Epic Win
animations.description: Metallic 3D text with rotating entrance, layered shadows, and victory flare effect.

animations.title: Wave Text
animations.description: Smooth undulating wave motion through characters for fluid text animations.

animations.title: Glitch Text
animations.description: Digital distortion with RGB channel separation and scanning line artifacts.

animations.title: Typewriter
animations.description: Classic terminal-style text typing with blinking cursor for system messages.

animations.title: Combo Counter
animations.description: Dynamic counting animation with milestone particles and perfect combo celebration.

animations.title: XP Number Pop
animations.description: XP gain count-up with pop easing, glow orb, and particle effects.

animations.title: Level Breakthrough
animations.description: Level breakthrough shakes frame with surge lines explosion effect.

animations.title: Counter Increment
animations.description: Numeric counter ticks upwards with scale.

animations.title: Wave Reveal
animations.description: Staggered wave animation where text appears from bottom with smooth easing.

animations.title: Light Sweep Draw
animations.description: Left-to-right cinematic highlight that briefly brightens and deforms each letter with a gentle settle.

animations.title: Metallic Specular Flash
animations.description: A crisp, narrow specular flash sweeps across the text with brief skew and stretch, then settles.

animations.title: Horizon Light Pass
animations.description: A horizontal light band passes across the text, briefly brightening and stretching letters before settling.

animations.title: Shake
animations.description: Horizontal shake with rotation wobble and scale compression for error feedback.

animations.title: Bounce
animations.description: Vertical bounce with squash-stretch deformation and tilt for playful feedback.

animations.title: Pulse
animations.description: Scale pulse with opacity fade and expanding glow for heartbeat effect.

animations.title: Rubber Band
animations.description: Elastic stretch with thickness variation and edge vibration for springy motion.

animations.title: Swing
animations.description: Pendulum arc swing with axis rotation and momentum lean for hanging elements.

animations.title: Jello
animations.description: Wobble deformation with ripple-through effect and bounce for gelatinous motion.

animations.title: Pop
animations.description: Scale overshoot entrance with rotation twist and motion blur for emphasis.

animations.title: Wiggle
animations.description: Rotation oscillation with scale breathing and position drift for attention.

animations.title: Flip
animations.description: Y-axis card flip with shadow perspective and scale change during rotation.

animations.title: Spin
animations.description: 360-degree rotation with scale pulse at midpoint and motion blur trail.

animations.title: Float
animations.description: Gentle Y-axis sine wave with subtle rotation and shadow distance changes.

animations.title: Fade
animations.description: Simple opacity transition from invisible to visible for smooth appearances.

animations.title: Slide
animations.description: Linear sliding motion from off-screen position for panel entrances.

animations.title: Scale
animations.description: Clean scale transformation from small to full size without bounce.

animations.title: Blink
animations.description: Rapid opacity flash for attention-grabbing notifications and alerts.

animations.title: Squeeze
animations.description: Compression effect that squashes element for tactile button feedback.

animations.title: Tada
animations.description: Celebration animation combining scale and rotation for success moments.

animations.title: HeartBeat
animations.description: Double-pulse rhythm animation for likes and favorite interactions.

animations.title: Gentle Scale Pop
animations.description: Scale entrance from 88% up to 105% settling at 100% with 72% overlay fade and 12px→0px blur.

animations.title: Slide Up Soft
animations.description: Slides in from the up by 64px with 70% overlay fade and soft blur 8px.

animations.title: Slide Down Welcome
animations.description: Slides in from the down by 60px with 68% overlay fade and soft blur 8px.

animations.title: Slide Left Drift
animations.description: Slides in from the right by 68px with 68% overlay fade and soft blur 7px.

animations.title: Slide Right Drift
animations.description: Slides in from the left by 68px with 68% overlay fade and soft blur 7px.

animations.title: Spring Bounce
animations.description: Elastic spring entrance with dynamic bounce physics and smooth overlay transition.

animations.title: 3D Card Flip
animations.description: Card game style 3D rotation reveal with perspective depth and overshoot.

animations.title: Digital Glitch
animations.description: Cyberpunk-inspired RGB channel separation with digital distortion artifacts.

animations.title: Portal Swirl
animations.description: Fantasy game vortex entrance with spiral rotation and morphing border radius.

animations.title: CRT TV Turn On
animations.description: Retro CRT monitor power-on effect with horizontal-to-vertical expansion.

animations.title: Origami Unfold
animations.description: Paper-style unfolding animation with sequential axis expansion.

animations.title: Shatter Assembly
animations.description: Glass fragments coalesce into modal with blur and rotation effects.

animations.title: Material Ripple

animations.title: Elastic Zoom Bounce
animations.description: Mobile game style zoom with elastic bounce physics and overshoot.
